title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Boil the spaghetti. 2. Cook the bacon until crispy. 3. Beat the eggs and mix with cheese. 4. Toss spaghetti with bacon, eggs, and cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate the chicken in yogurt and masala. 2. Grill the chicken. 3. Make the gravy with onions, tomatoes, and cream. 4. Combine chicken with the gravy.
